After a detailed evaluation, we designed a customized full-mouth rehabilitation plan, including specialized prosthetics and coordinated care with their oncologist. Within months, the patient regained not just function, but also the confidence to smile and socialize again. The joy in their eyes was our biggest reward—it reminded us that we don’t just treat teeth, we transform lives.

top_product: Our top product is the OKBOZ Super App — a single platform that offers taxi services, on-demand services (like electricians, plumbers, beauty services), 1-on-1 emergency medical video consultations, laundry services, and goods delivery. It helps businesses reach more customers and manage orders easily.
ideal_referral: My ideal referral is a business owner, service provider, or entrepreneur who wants to grow their customer base through digital services. Specifically, taxi service owners, on-demand service providers (like electricians, plumbers, beauty parlors), CCTV installers, digital marketing agencies, home appliance service centers, and water purifier service companies are perfect referrals for me. I also welcome hospitals and clinics looking to offer emergency ambulance services through our app
top_problem_solved: Businesses often struggle to find more customers and manage multiple services in one place. OKBOZ Super App solves this by providing a powerful platform where businesses can connect with customers for taxi bookings, on-demand services, beauty care, medical consultations, deliveries, and more — all from a single app.
